column4: Hello. I have a ubuntu server / HTPC. I want to controll some apps that need graphical interfaces (i know of ssh and so, but i rly need graphical soulutions this time). The problem is that i have to config them while some other ppl is looking at a movie, so basicly i need two desktops, one for local display (the tv) and one for remote uses. Can i do this?
yes you should setup a second X server
do i rly need a whole new x-server? do you know what i should google on?
something like remote control sexond server xorg for example
